messages.message:
Found two UI bugs for the multi doc converse:
1. You can add the same doc to the context twice (https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-1074)
2. If your converse project has folders, you canâ€™t choose any docs (https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-1075). 
3. If you leave a conversation and come back, the context is forgotten (is this by design?)
These are known bugs, and should be resolved in aihub-sandbox. Let me know if you still see this in the latest one
The fixes aren't backported since this is internal only this release
Sounds good thanks. For the #3 is that something thats being tracked too, i got stuck a few times as context would be lost if you change conversations
Yup #3 scope persist feature is also added in the latest version
